title: The Mammoth Book of Time Travel Romance
description: Twenty tales of swashbuckling adventure and passionate romance from some of the most exciting names in romance fiction, including Margo Maguire, Autumn Daw, Sandy Blair, Michele Maddox, Patti O’Shea, Holly Lisle, Kimberly Raye, and Madeline Baker.Join the heroines in this delightful anthology as they step backwards—or forwards—in time, transported to the Scottish Highlands or yesteryear, the Wild West, or the distant future. Propelled through time into situations rich with possibility and fraught with danger, these sexy, sassy heroines each seek their dreamed of happy ending.Will souls separated by time be reunited—or kept apart—forever?
author: Trisha Telep
